9#define HID_PAGE_FIDO 0xF1D0
10#define HID_FIDO_U2F 0x01
11#define HID_FIDO_INPUT 0x20
12#define HID_FIDO_OUTPUT 0x21

14#define HID_EP_IN 0x81
15#define HID_EP_OUT 0x01

30/* HID report: FIDO U2F */
31static const uint8_t hid_u2f_report_desc[] = {
32 HID_RI_USAGE_PAGE(16, HID_PAGE_FIDO),
33 HID_USAGE(HID_FIDO_U2F),
34 HID_COLLECTION(HID_APPLICATION_COLLECTION),
35 HID_USAGE(HID_FIDO_INPUT),

140static void hid_u2f_init(usbd_device* dev, FuriHalUsbInterface* intf, void* ctx);
141static void hid_u2f_deinit(usbd_device* dev);
142static void hid_u2f_on_wakeup(usbd_device* dev);
143static void hid_u2f_on_suspend(usbd_device* dev);
144
145//static bool hid_u2f_send_report(uint8_t report_id);
146static usbd_respond hid_u2f_ep_config(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t cfg);
147static usbd_respond
148 hid_u2f_control(usbd_device* dev, usbd_ctlreq* req, usbd_rqc_callback* callback);
149static usbd_device* usb_dev;
150static FuriSemaphore* hid_u2f_semaphore = NULL;
151static bool hid_u2f_connected = false;
152
153static HidU2fCallback callback;
154static void* cb_ctx;
155
156bool furi_hal_hid_u2f_is_connected() {
157 return hid_u2f_connected;
158}
159
160void furi_hal_hid_u2f_set_callback(HidU2fCallback cb, void* ctx) {
161 if(callback != NULL) {
162 if(hid_u2f_connected == true) {
163 callback(HidU2fDisconnected, cb_ctx);
164 }
165 }
166
167 callback = cb;
168 cb_ctx = ctx;
169
170 if(callback != NULL) {
171 if(hid_u2f_connected == true) {
172 callback(HidU2fConnected, cb_ctx);
173 }
174 }
175}
176
177FuriHalUsbInterface usb_hid_u2f = {
178 .init = hid_u2f_init,
179 .deinit = hid_u2f_deinit,
180 .wakeup = hid_u2f_on_wakeup,
181 .suspend = hid_u2f_on_suspend,
182
183 .dev_descr = (struct usb_device_descriptor*)&hid_u2f_device_desc,
184
185 .str_manuf_descr = (void*)&dev_manuf_desc,
186 .str_prod_descr = (void*)&dev_prod_desc,
187 .str_serial_descr = NULL,
188
189 .cfg_descr = (void*)&hid_u2f_cfg_desc,
190};
191
192static void hid_u2f_init(usbd_device* dev, FuriHalUsbInterface* intf, void* ctx) {
193 UNUSED(intf);
194 UNUSED(ctx);
195 if(hid_u2f_semaphore == NULL) {
196 hid_u2f_semaphore = furi_semaphore_alloc(1, 1);
197 }
198 usb_dev = dev;
199
200 usbd_reg_config(dev, hid_u2f_ep_config);
201 usbd_reg_control(dev, hid_u2f_control);
202
203 usbd_connect(dev, true);
204}
205
206static void hid_u2f_deinit(usbd_device* dev) {
207 usbd_reg_config(dev, NULL);
208 usbd_reg_control(dev, NULL);
209}
210
211static void hid_u2f_on_wakeup(usbd_device* dev) {
212 UNUSED(dev);
213 hid_u2f_connected = true;
214 if(callback != NULL) {
215 callback(HidU2fConnected, cb_ctx);
216 }
217}
218
219static void hid_u2f_on_suspend(usbd_device* dev) {
220 UNUSED(dev);
221 if(hid_u2f_connected) {
222 hid_u2f_connected = false;
223 furi_semaphore_release(hid_u2f_semaphore);
224 if(callback != NULL) {
225 callback(HidU2fDisconnected, cb_ctx);
226 }
227 }
228}
229
230void furi_hal_hid_u2f_send_response(uint8_t* data, uint8_t len) {
231 if((hid_u2f_semaphore == NULL) || (hid_u2f_connected == false)) return;
232 furi_check(furi_semaphore_acquire(hid_u2f_semaphore, FuriWaitForever) == FuriStatusOk);
233 if(hid_u2f_connected == true) {
234 usbd_ep_write(usb_dev, HID_EP_OUT, data, len);
235 }
236}
237
238uint32_t furi_hal_hid_u2f_get_request(uint8_t* data) {
239 int32_t len = usbd_ep_read(usb_dev, HID_EP_IN, data, HID_U2F_PACKET_LEN);
240 return ((len < 0) ? 0 : len);
241}
242
243static void hid_u2f_rx_ep_callback(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t event, uint8_t ep) {
244 UNUSED(dev);
245 UNUSED(event);
246 UNUSED(ep);
247 if(callback != NULL) {
248 callback(HidU2fRequest, cb_ctx);
249 }
250}
251
252static void hid_u2f_tx_ep_callback(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t event, uint8_t ep) {
253 UNUSED(dev);
254 UNUSED(event);
255 UNUSED(ep);
256 furi_semaphore_release(hid_u2f_semaphore);
257}
258
259static void hid_u2f_txrx_ep_callback(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t event, uint8_t ep) {
260 if(event == usbd_evt_eptx) {
261 hid_u2f_tx_ep_callback(dev, event, ep);
262 } else {
263 hid_u2f_rx_ep_callback(dev, event, ep);
264 }
265}
266
267/* Configure endpoints */
268static usbd_respond hid_u2f_ep_config(usbd_device* dev, uint8_t cfg) {
269 switch(cfg) {
270 case 0:
271 /* deconfiguring device */
272 usbd_ep_deconfig(dev, HID_EP_OUT);
273 usbd_ep_deconfig(dev, HID_EP_IN);
274 usbd_reg_endpoint(dev, HID_EP_OUT, 0);
275 usbd_reg_endpoint(dev, HID_EP_IN, 0);
276 return usbd_ack;
277 case 1:
278 /* configuring device */
279 usbd_ep_config(dev, HID_EP_IN, USB_EPTYPE_INTERRUPT, HID_U2F_PACKET_LEN);
280 usbd_ep_config(dev, HID_EP_OUT, USB_EPTYPE_INTERRUPT, HID_U2F_PACKET_LEN);
281 usbd_reg_endpoint(dev, HID_EP_IN, hid_u2f_txrx_ep_callback);
282 usbd_reg_endpoint(dev, HID_EP_OUT, hid_u2f_txrx_ep_callback);
283 usbd_ep_write(dev, HID_U2F_PACKET_LEN, 0, 0);
284 return usbd_ack;
285 default:
286 return usbd_fail;
287 }
288}
289
290/* Control requests handler */
291static usbd_respond
292 hid_u2f_control(usbd_device* dev, usbd_ctlreq* req, usbd_rqc_callback* callback) {
293 UNUSED(callback);
294 /* HID control requests */
295 if(((USB_REQ_RECIPIENT | USB_REQ_TYPE) & req->bmRequestType) ==
296 (USB_REQ_INTERFACE | USB_REQ_CLASS) &&
297 req->wIndex == 0) {
298 switch(req->bRequest) {
299 case USB_HID_SETIDLE:
300 return usbd_ack;
301 default:
302 return usbd_fail;
303 }
304 }
305 if(((USB_REQ_RECIPIENT | USB_REQ_TYPE) & req->bmRequestType) ==
306 (USB_REQ_INTERFACE | USB_REQ_STANDARD) &&
307 req->wIndex == 0 && req->bRequest == USB_STD_GET_DESCRIPTOR) {
308 switch(req->wValue >> 8) {
309 case USB_DTYPE_HID:
310 dev->status.data_ptr = (uint8_t*)&(hid_u2f_cfg_desc.iad_0.hid_desc);
311 dev->status.data_count = sizeof(hid_u2f_cfg_desc.iad_0.hid_desc);
312 return usbd_ack;
313 case USB_DTYPE_HID_REPORT:
314 dev->status.data_ptr = (uint8_t*)hid_u2f_report_desc;
315 dev->status.data_count = sizeof(hid_u2f_report_desc);
316 return usbd_ack;
317 default:
318 return usbd_fail;
319 }
320 }
321 return usbd_fail;
322}
